name: Resample
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
Resample, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.utils, interface: Resample).
Resample or reorient an image using AFNI 3dresample command
For complete details, see the `3dresample Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dresample.html>`_

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input file to 3dresample.

inputs.name: Orientation
inputs.description: A string. New orientation code. [RPI, LPI, ARI, LPI, RAI, LAI, RSA, LSA, ASA, PSA, RSP, LSP, ASP, PSP, RAI, LAI, RPI, LPI, RAI, LAI]

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output image file name.
